name: Use of Sysinternals PsService
description: Detects usage of Sysinternals PsService for service reconnaissance or tamper
false_positives: Legitimate use of PsService by an administrator
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.pe.original_file_name:psservice.exe OR process.executable:(*\\PsService.exe OR *\\PsService64.exe))`
